name: Sara
placeOfBirth: New Randyport, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago)
description: Sara is a blue-eyed llama with white hair, standing 177 cm tall. Originally from New Randyport, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago), Sara enjoys wood carving, singing, painting. Known for their gentle and playful personality, Sara is a beloved member of the llama community.
